metadata.title: CVE-2014-0212 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: qpid-cpp: ACL policies only loaded if the acl-file option specifiedenabling DoS by consuming all available file descriptors

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
